summary: The Specialty Crop Domestic Market Promotion and Development Program Act of 2025 aims to amend the Specialty Crops Competitiveness Act of 2004. It directs the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a grant program for eligible organizations to encourage the development, maintenance, and expansion of the domestic market for specialty crops. The bill outlines application requirements, marketing plan standards, grant amounts, matching fund requirements, and program evaluations. It also defines eligible organizations and authorizes appropriations of $75 million annually for fiscal year 2026 and beyond.
